title: Sold Out
description: From USA Today bestselling author, A.M. Madden comes the final novel in The Back-Up Series.Life as rock stars couldn’t be better for Devil’s Lair.Wealth, success, love all make for perfect lives.That is until fate steps in, once again.There are twists and turns that you’ll never see coming. Grab some tissues because you're going to need them. The Back-Up Series is a bestselling rock star saga that should be read in order: Back-Up, Front & Center, Encore, Backstage, The Devil's Lair, Backstage Pass, Sold Out.
author: A.M. Madden
